name: Interact with the Dining Hall Door

nodes.text: I would have thought for sure the thief came this way for more apples, but there's no indication this door has any apple juice around this end of the hall.
That pot of something carved into the doorway might be a clue that this is the Dining Hall.

options.text: Read the Menu by the Door

nodes.text: Let's see if I can hear anything now...
The Dining Hall sounds pretty empty. Guess the castle is deserted for the holiday.
With Terk snooping around, this is probably not a good time to practice my listening skills.
Let's see if I can hear anything now.
Oops... I can hear footsteps... Terk must still be on patrol!
Is that footsteps I hear?
Conner! It's past curfew. Five demerits - and go to your room!
Let's see if I can hear anything now...
I guess no one's in the Dining Hall right now.
It's awfully loud in there. Sounds like dinner's already started!
It seems quiet in there. I guess it isn't mealtime.
It's locked! Guess they don't want us sneaking in for snacks after-hours.
I can't pick the lock without a lockpick!
What do you think you are doing there, young man?
I, um... was just cleaning out some... er... chewing gum out of the lock. Chef Kinah asked me to check to see why the lock was sticking. There! Should work fine now.
Chewing gum in the lock? That abomination is not allowed at this school! If I see anyone chewing gum around here, they will get 10 demerits.
Now, go on your way!
I'd better not try to pick this lock when Terk's around...
I'm in!
Nope, not this time.
